leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.strongTex:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section detailing what the user keeps when leaving a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "When you leave the track, you still keep:"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.listItem1:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing that solutions are kept after leaving a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → "You still keep" list
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "All solutions you have submitted in %{trackTitle}"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.listItem2:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing that mentoring received is kept after leaving a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → "You still keep" list
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "All mentoring you have received in %{trackTitle}"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.howeverWe:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the section detailing what will happen when the user leaves a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "However, we will:"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.listItem3:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing that mentoring discussions will end after leaving a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → "However, we will" list
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "End all mentoring discussions in %{trackTitle}"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.listItem4:
**Functional Purpose**: Item describing that the track will be removed from the active tracks list after leaving
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → "However, we will" list
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Variable `trackTitle` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "Remove %{trackTitle} from your active tracks list"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.infoBoxTe:
**Functional Purpose**: Informational message about rejoining a track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → Info box
**When Users See This**: When viewing the confirmation message before leaving a track
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "You’re free to join back at anytime and return to where you left off."
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to cancel the leave track action
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → Action buttons
**When Users See This**: When deciding whether to leave the track or stay
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Cancel"
leaveTrackModal.leaveTrackForm.leaveTrac:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm leaving the track
**UI Location**: Leave Track modal → Confirmation form → Action buttons
**When Users See This**: When confirming the decision to leave the track
**Technical Context**: Standard button text
**Current English**: "Leave track"
